argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptfidmadd.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptfidmadd.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptfidmadd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptfidmadd.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptfidmadd.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptfidmadd.d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsummptfidmadd.f | |- F = ( x e. A |-> C ) |
| 8 |  | gsummptfidmadd.h | |- H = ( x e. A |-> D ) |
| 9 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 10 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 6, 9, 10 | #P_offval2 | |- ( ph -> ( F oF .+ H ) = ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_gsummptfidmadd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
